data.enText: to make sth seem less important than it really is
data.chText: 低调处理；降低…的重要性

tr: play a card lower than (a held high card)

example.ex: We often underplay the skills we have...
example.tran: 我们常常贬低自身的技能。

example.ex: The problem of alcoholism was, and still is, often underplayed.
example.tran: 酗酒问题在过去常常被忽视，现在依然如此。

value.def: If you underplay something, you make it seem less important than it really is.

value.boxr_value: in AM, usually use 美国英语通常用 play down
